menu.description: If you are one of those people who like your chicken big on spiciness, this is the sandwich for you. A thick, juicy cutlet of chicken thigh and drum sits fiery hot on a bed of crunchy letture between toasted sesame seed buns - shiok!
menu.items: McSpicy Burger, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: Feel the heat. We double the spiciness with two fiery, juicy whole-muscle chicken on a bed of crisp lettuce between toasted sesame seed buns - shiok!
menu.items: Double McSpicy Burger, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: An evergreen favourite, McChicken has been winning fans with its wholesome great taste - tender chicken patties plus the right touch of mayo. Just classic.
menu.items: McChicken Burger, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: Since its introduction in 1968, the Big Mac has grown to become an icon for burger lovers everywhere. Our two all-beef patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun recipe makes a one-of-a-kind experience
menu.items: BigMac Burger, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: Start with a perfect McDonald's Hamburger. Put warm, melting cheese on the patty and take the experience to the next level. Need we say more?
menu.items: CheeseBurger Burger, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: Seeing double? We do the double on the beef and cheese to double your enjoyment with every one bite.
menu.items: Double CheeseBurger Burger, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: A boxful of bite-sized treats, beautifully battered - good as a quick snack or as part of a hearty meal. Our Chicken McNuggets are a childhood favourite that you won't outgrow
menu.items: Chicken McNuggets, Medium Fries, Medium Coke

menu.description: If chicken's your thing, our McWings will send you right over the edge. Coated with a light batter, we guarantee you'll be impressed.
The catch of the day is sure a great catch at McDonald's. A fish fillet, smothered with tangy tartar sauce and half a slice of cheese between tender steamed buns is simply pure ocean heaven.
